page.title: Privacy Policy
page.subtitle: Your privacy is fundamental to our mission

intro.title: Our Privacy Commitment
intro.content: At re-frame.social, we understand that privacy is especially important for people with social anxiety. We've designed our service with your privacy as the top priority.

principles.title: Core Privacy Principles
list: We don't require accounts or logins
We don't store your thoughts or personal information
We don't use cookies for tracking
We don't share data with third parties
We don't display ads or use your data for marketing

anonymous.title: Anonymous Usage Data
anonymous.description: To improve our service, we collect minimal anonymous data:
list: General usage patterns (pages visited, features used)

temporary.title: Temporary Session Data
temporary.description: During your session, we temporarily process:
list: The thoughts you submit for reframing (deleted immediately after processing)
Your language preference (stored in your browser only)

thoughts.title: Your Thoughts
thoughts.content: The thoughts you share are processed in real-time and immediately deleted. They are never stored in our databases or logs.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.content: We use privacy-focused analytics that don't track individual users. All data is aggregated and anonymized.

security.title: Security Measures
security.content: All connections are encrypted using HTTPS. We follow industry best practices for security.

list.name: Google Cloud Platform
list.data: Processes thoughts in real-time, no storage

list.name: Cloudflare
list.data: Basic traffic protection, no personal data

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Since we don't store personal data, there's nothing to request or delete. You always have the right to:
list: Clear your browser data to reset your session
Contact us with any privacy concerns

contact.title: Privacy Questions?
contact.content: If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us:

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: If we make changes to this policy, we'll notify users through a prominent notice on our site. We'll never reduce your privacy rights without clear consent.

compliance.title: Legal Compliance
compliance.content: We comply with applicable privacy laws including GDPR and CCPA. We operate with privacy-by-design principles.
